mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.CityID as cityId, a.CityName as cityName, a.provinceId as provinceId, p.name as provinceName, c.id as countryId, c.chineseName as countryName, a.areaId as areaId from city a left join province p on a.provinceId = p.id left join country c on c.id=p.country_id where a.ID = #{ID}
